name: reworking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of changing a speech or a piece of writing in order to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose, or something that has been changed in this way: His latest book is a reworking of material from his previous short stories. Producing such a great story takes practice and continual reworking. See
rework
More examplesFewer examplesHe wants to see the policy go back to a committee for reworking.The play is a hilarious reworking of the Faust story.The stories were the reworking of an old tradition.
